com.snedigart.jsync

Class SyncOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snedigart.jsync.SyncOptions

  • public final class SyncOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    The SyncOptions class defines the options that will be used by Syncer. Example use: SyncOptions opts = new SyncOptionsBuilder().deleteUnmatchedTargets(true).smartCopy(true).chunkSize( 1024).build();
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tyler Snedigar

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SyncOptions.SyncOptionsBuilder
      This builder class builds a complete SyncOptions object and returns it

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SyncOptions DEFAULT_OPTIONS 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getChunkSize()
      Returns the buffer size that will be used while copying.
      java.util.List<SyncFilter> getExclusionFilters()
      Returns an unmodifiable List of the exclusion filters.
      java.util.List<SyncFilter> getInclusionFilters()
      Returns an unmodifiable List of the inclusion filters.
      boolean isDeleteEmptyTargetDirectories()
      Returns the option of whether or not to delete empty target directories.
      boolean isDeleteUnmatchedTargets()
      Returns the option of whether or not to delete target files/directories that do not correspond to a source file/directory.
      boolean isMatchAllExclusionFilters()
      Returns the flag to match all exclusion filters, or match any exclusion filter.
      boolean isMatchAllInclusionFilters()
      Returns the flag to match all inclusion filters, or match any inclusion filter.
      boolean isPreserveModifiedTime()
      Returns the option of whether or not to preserve the modified time.
      boolean isSmartCopy()
      Returns the option of whether or not smart copy will be used.

    • Method Detail

      • isDeleteUnmatchedTargets

        public boolean isDeleteUnmatchedTargets()
        Returns the option of whether or not to delete target files/directories that do not correspond to a source file/directory. Defaults to true.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isDeleteEmptyTargetDirectories

        public boolean isDeleteEmptyTargetDirectories()
        Returns the option of whether or not to delete empty target directories. Defaults to true.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isSmartCopy

        public boolean isSmartCopy()
        Returns the option of whether or not smart copy will be used. Defaults to true.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isPreserveModifiedTime

        public boolean isPreserveModifiedTime()
        Returns the option of whether or not to preserve the modified time. Defaults to true.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • getChunkSize

        public long getChunkSize()
        Returns the buffer size that will be used while copying. Defaults to 16MB.
        Returns:
        long

      • getInclusionFilters

        public java.util.List<SyncFilter> getInclusionFilters()
        Returns an unmodifiable List of the inclusion filters. Defaults to an empty list.
        Returns:
        List of SyncFilters

      • getExclusionFilters

        public java.util.List<SyncFilter> getExclusionFilters()
        Returns an unmodifiable List of the exclusion filters. Defaults to an empty list.
        Returns:
        List of SyncFilters

      • isMatchAllInclusionFilters

        public boolean isMatchAllInclusionFilters()
        Returns the flag to match all inclusion filters, or match any inclusion filter. Defaults to true (must match all inclusion filters).
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isMatchAllExclusionFilters

        public boolean isMatchAllExclusionFilters()
        Returns the flag to match all exclusion filters, or match any exclusion filter. Defaults to true (must match all exclusion filters).
        Returns:
        boolean
